text: vetamutaiyavarkale! Meyyakave unakalitam nam'mutaiya tutar vantirukkinrar. Vetattiliruntu ninkal maraittuk kontiruppavarril pala visayankalai avar unkalukku vilakkik kattuvar. Innum, (ippolutu tevaiyillata) anekattai vittuvituvar. Niccayamaka allahvitamiruntu peroliyum, telivumulla (tiruk kur'an ennum) vetamum unkalitam vantirukkinratu
